title: St Tropez House Concentrates on Sales with Competitive Prices
text: St Tropez House Concentrates on Sales with Competitive Prices St Tropez House Concentrates on Sales with Competitive Prices After Successful Rental Period Latest statics reveal that up to 25% of the online agency's premium clients are considering buying a property rather than renting a villa every year for the summer. ST TROPEZ, FRANCE, October 14,   Leading real-estate website St Tropez House has reported a boom in the number of summer rentals this year, according to the company's latest figures. Holiday lets in the second quarter of 2015 were particularly buoyant, with a spokesman for the company heralding the months from March to July as a "tremendous success". There has also been a growing trend for repeat booking customers to buy property in the area, rather than continue to book holiday lets year on year. Latest statics reveal that up to 25% of the online agency's premium clients are considering buying a property rather than renting a villa every year for the summer. Emilia Jedamska, the operating manager of St Tropez House, said: "I am genuinely pleased with the achievements the whole team has accomplished this season. We have lots of satisfied customers and many of them are returning over the years. As a result, the agency has decided to strengthen its St Tropez villa sales department in order to meet this increased demand. All properties offered for sale by St Tropez House are sold directly from the owners, meaning that clients get the very best prices possible with no hidden fees or commissions. Such competitive prices heighten the appeal of investing in one of the region's most popular towns, with its plethora of first-class bars and restaurants, enviable Mediterranean climate and famous Tropezienne lifestyle. To further incentivise buyers, properties for sale with St Tropez House are offered at a price for immediate sale, such as luxury villas Coba, Kalliste and Modernity which are currently on the market. Villa Coba , a modern 6-bedroom residence with a contemporary interior style, would make the ideal home from home for anyone wishing to stay close to the action. It is only a short walk from Pampelonne beach whilst the centre of Saint Tropez is also only a few minutes away. Another exquisite modern property, Villa Kalliste , is located in one of Saint Tropez's most prestigious locations: the famous secured domain "Les Parcs de St Tropez". This property is also within walking distance of the sea, and just 4km from the town centre. The 5-bedroom villa with a surface area of 270m2 is set within a large garden and boasts its own private swimming pool making it an ideal villa for large families and groups. As the name suggests, Villa Modernity is a state-of-the-art villa with 6 bedrooms, a heated swimming pool and a stunning landscaped garden. With a surface area of 300m2, this modern villa is a short walk from Pampelonne beach or an 8-minute drive from the heart of Saint Tropez. While these properties are currently for sale at highly competitive prices, reflecting the agency's desire to incentivise this particular trend in the market, they are also available for rent.St Tropez House is a premium property website facilitating the rental and sale of high-end holiday houses on the Presqu'ile of Saint Tropez. It is also the leading agency for those looking for villas to rent or properties available for sale in Saint Tropez, Ramatuelle and Gassin. For a personalised selection of villas, please contact Emilia Jedamska at emilia@sttropezhouse.com or call her directly on +33 428 31 18 46. # # #
